attributes.title: ✨black lives matter✨
attributes.review: bunker boy is a little butt hurt we ruined his white supremacy rally. aww gonna cry? 😹 chile anyway. i’m here because he’s threatening to take away tik tok so it’s only fair if we take away his lil app too. we can’t be stopped. also while i’m at it, black lives matter. lgbtqia+ rights. no person is illegal on stolen land. trump is a disgrace to the integrity of this nation and everyone living here.✨😁😽😇

attributes.title: ✨it’s hideous ✨
attributes.review: graphic design is my passion 👁👄👁, and when I saw the layout 😭 girl lemme tell you, when you first open the app, there’s a hideous orange monster holding up a white supremacy symbol (aryan fist) 🤢 and asking for your information so they can send propaganda 📲 the color scheme (red white and blue) conveyed a sense of unhealthy nationalism 👎🏻 the red in question is similar to blood (to symbolize how much bloodshed this administration has caused) 😳 and the first notification was “you’re a fat b*tch vote trump 2020” 😭😭😭 so yes!! trump did that 😍✨💞 but he better not do it again ✨🧚🏻‍♀️🪐💫🦋

Don’t hold it against me

attributes.title: Poop

attributes.title: Horrible App
attributes.review: The app wouldn’t even let me past the log in screen! I typed in a mobile phone number, crash! (SAD!) Once it didn’t crash after about the fifth time , I NEVER RECEIVED THE VERIFICATION CODE..... SAD! Waste of my time and I just wasted your time because tik tok sent me 👁💋👁

attributes.title: GEN Z RULES
attributes.review: Let’s be honest Trump is a joke. He’s racist old has like 25 rape allegations. Literally any (Non Republican) civilian would be a better president.

attributes.title: This app needs to be taken down
attributes.review: This app is horrible it is full of racist content.also it is supper laggy and makes you pay for 90% of the news. Also they are trying to take down a app that has helps with peoples depression me included. That tic tock has saved life’s and it should not be taken down.also it supports a rapist and a racist and tells people to hack the voting polls pleas take this app down I beg of you
